name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just Zoom It! - See Clearly, Easily!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience Smooth Pinch-to-Zoom gestures, just like on your touchpad or touchscreen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just Zoom It! - is a simple yet powerful accessibility tool designed for anyone who struggles with small text or detailed web pages. Using the Alt/Opt key and your mouse wheel, you can pinch zoom just like on a laptopâ€™s touchpad, making web content easier to read without straining your eyes.

Navigate horizontally with ease using the Shift key and mouse wheel, and reset your zoom with just one click. Perfect for anyone with visual challenges, and great to recommend to family or friends who might need it too!

Take care of your eyes and enjoy a clearer, more comfortable browsing experience today.
